product.title: Mayfair Mint Dimout Perfect Fit
product.description: Get the freshness of a crisp white with the eye-catching charm of a pastel with the mayfair mint dimout pleated perfect fit. This delightful pleated fabric has a gentle checkering effect when viewed up close, that smoothes out from a distance into a creamy mint. The dimout style allows for some light to pass through even when the blind is closed, to enable some light alongside privacy, ideal for daytime rooms such as receptions and conservatories.

relproducts.title: Verona Prime 25mm Titanium Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Their range of verona 25mm perfect fit aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. A stylish grey tone, this titanium perfect fit venetian blind adds a bold grey shade to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wood accessories for a chic finished look. Perfect fit blinds are designed for use with a upvc door and window as they are drill, and screw-free.

relproducts.title: Mayfair Ash Dimout Perfect Fit
relproducts.description: For a grey with a darker hue, the moody mid-dark tone of the mayfair ash dimout makes it an excellent choice. The smooth single-tone fabric enjoys natural shading courtesy of the pleated ripples that run the length of the blind, creating natural highlights and deepening shadows throughout. The innovative perfect fit system clips in direct to your window for a tools-free fit that installs quickly and removes from your window without leaving a trace.

relproducts.title: Mayfair Noir Dimout Perfect Fit
relproducts.description: Bewitch all who befall your mayfair noir dimout blinds, as their dark glamour creates the ultimate dramatic statement piece. The matt black fabric benefits from extra light and depth created from the shadows of the polyester blind's pleating, giving it a beautifully tactile look. Despite its dark tone, the noir blind is created with dimout fabric to allow light to gently filter through in the daytime, to create a gentle light glow even when the blind is closed for full privacy.
